title: Church Settings
subtitle: Manage your church details and preferences
subtitleDesktop: Manage your church details and invite new members
adminOnly: Only church administrators can modify settings. Contact your admin for changes.

tabDescriptions.invite: Share join code with new members

brandColor.label: Brand Color
brandColor.hint: This color will be used for buttons, highlights, and accents throughout your church's app.

invite.title: Invite Members
invite.description: Share the join code to invite people to your church
invite.shareHint: Share this code with new members to connect them to your church.

regenerateDialog.title: Regenerate Join Code?
regenerateDialog.description: This will create a new code and invalidate the current one. Anyone with the old code won't be able to join.

locations.title: Locations
locations.description: Manage your church's venues and rooms

empty.title: No locations yet
empty.description: Add your first location to use in events

dialog.addDescription: Add a new location for your events.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Location?
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

empty.title: No campuses yet
empty.description: Add your first campus to organize your church locations

dialog.addDescription: Add a new campus for your church.
dialog.isDefaultHint: New members will be assigned to this campus by default

deleteDialog.title: Delete Campus?
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? Members and events assigned to this campus will need to be reassigned. This action cannot be undone.

empty.title: No agenda items yet
empty.description: Add your first agenda item to use in events

dialog.addDescription: Create a reusable agenda item for your events and templates.
dialog.editDescription: Update the agenda item details. Changes won't affect items already added to events.

deleteDialog.title: Delete agenda item?
deleteDialog.description: This will remove "{title}" from your agenda items library. Items already added to events or templates will not be affected.

preferences.title: Church Preferences
preferences.description: Configure regional settings for your church

timezone.label: Timezone
timezone.hint: This timezone will be used for displaying event times

firstDayOfWeek.label: First Day of Week
firstDayOfWeek.hint: Choose which day the calendar week starts on

timeFormat.label: Time Format
timeFormat.hint: Choose how times are displayed throughout the app

eventVisibility.label: Default Event Visibility
eventVisibility.leadersDescription: Visible to leaders and admins only
eventVisibility.hint: New events will default to this visibility level

transfer.title: Transfer Ownership
transfer.description: Transfer ownership of this church to an admin. This action cannot be undone. You will become an admin after transferring ownership.
transfer.noAdmins: No admins available to transfer ownership to. Promote a member to admin first from the People page.
transfer.selectHint: Only admins can become the new owner. Click to select.
transfer.transferredSuccess: Ownership transferred successfully! You are now an admin.

dialog.title: Transfer Church Ownership?
dialog.description: You are about to transfer ownership to {name}. This action cannot be undone. You will become an admin and lose owner privileges.
